Text: Nice! Just wish Marvel would finish one event before shoehorning the next one in. Bringing this out before Age of Ultron is finished kind of makes it feel as if it is just a What If? story that is not really important. Anyway to infinity and beyond.... Thanks STFmaryville

it's going to be the early 1990s all over again, with crossovers crossing over into special tie-in issues coinciding with a reboot of a relaunch with a hologram foil scratch 'n' sniff cover! for only $8.99 each!
